title: I Am Gold 5 -3 LP
body: I don't wether I'll get season rewards or not because of this. I also don't get how this is happening. [](http://imgur.com/a/ZmvKi) http://imgur.com/a/ZmvKi

replies.body: It looks like you're at -3 due to a[ queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Since you were promoted to Gold V, you have a short [Shield ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)that will prevent you from a demotion.  Your best bet is to get back in the positive, otherwise, continued losses can result in a demotion.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pERPlUxZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-15T22:22:14.145+0000)
>
> It looks like you're at -3 due to a[ queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Since you were promoted to Gold V, you have a short [Shield ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)that will prevent you from a demotion.  Your best bet is to get back in the positive, otherwise, continued losses can result in a demotion.  Hope that helps!

All I wanted to get to gold for was season rewards, do I need postitive LP to get them?
Nope!  Since there's no ranked decay in Gold you'll be just fine!  Congrats!
What if I get to gold but then drop back to silver a week later. Would I still get season rewards at the end of the year?
You would not get Gold rewards.  You earn rewards based off of where you finish at the end of the season, and not the highest rank achieved.
Thanks man, Riot almost Games is one of the best companys I know.
